column3:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#22543](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22543) (test: Use MiniWallet in mempool_limit.py by ShubhamPalriwala)
*

It feels slightly strange passing the `TestFramework` object into these functions in `util.py`. \n\nHopefully longer term, `create_confirmed_utxos()` will be replaced by a miniwallet function, and `mine_large_block()` and `generate_to_height()` can be moved to the single files that use those functions.
in commit 45817a7239cd5c0ef9126fbdf33bc72283eafa3a: Typo.\n\nAlso the signature can now be generalized to `*args, **kwargs`?
May as well make this a method on `ReplaceByFeeTest` now that it's taking a `test_framework` as its first argument.
Leaving this as a follow-up along with https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22741#discussion_r692029269 to minimize the diff in this pull.

Actually the diff won't increase with the options `--color-moved=dimmed-zebra --color-moved-ws=ignore-all-space`, so I went ahead to push the changes.\n\nAlso, I've reduced the other changes in this commit, because they can be done by scripted-diffs later on.
`generate_to_height` is removed, but the others remain for now
